duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide anesthesia care for surgical, obstetrical, and trauma patients.
Collaborate with anesthesiologists, surgeons, and other healthcare professionals to ensure patient safety and comfort during procedures.
Monitor patient vital signs and adjust anesthesia levels as needed during medical procedures.
Educate and inform patients and their families about anesthesia, pain management, and recovery.
Participate in emergency responses and provide critical care during life-threatening situations.

education_certification.credential: ACLS (ACLS) certification within 30 days of hire or transfer.
Basic Life Support (BLS) certification within 30 days of hire or transfer.
